name: Touhou Fusion
description:
Created in 72 hours for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 6 with the theme Combo!

Alice and Patchouli were in the library together and found an interesting tome. When they opened it and were reading together, a flash of light washed over Gensokyo. Marisa, Reimu, and Youmu were nearby and got turned into soul orbs. They combine and

POP!

Combo fusions!

Shoot your way through exciting levels and enemies using the combo fusion technique!

Controls:
WASD/D-Pad - Move
J/Dualshock X/Xbox A - Jump
K/Dualshock O/Xbox B - Shoot

Programming/Design - WitchsHex (Twitter/Itch)
Art/Design - NeonArcadia (Twitter/Twitch/Itch)
Music - JamieP (Twitter/Bandcamp)
